last_episode_to_air.name: Capítulo 6
last_episode_to_air.overview: As the Reborn extend their siege, an operation attempts to subdue the riot. Meanwhile, Miguel and Diosito will stop at nothing to protect their own.

name: El marginal
overview: An ex-cop entered a prison as convicted under a false identity in order to infiltrate within a group of prisoners that has just kidnapped the teenage daughter of an important national judge.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: This prequel season looks at how Borges and Diosito replaced prison leader El Sapo, at a time when San Onofre was at its most corrupt and violent.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: A year before Season 1, the Borges must protect a rich man's son while dealing with forces in and out of the prison that threaten their dominance.

seasons.name: Season 4
seasons.overview: A new prison, a new warden, a new nemesis, a new kid, a new alliance and an ex-wife play critical roles when the Borges are moved to a new lockup.

episodes.name: Chapter 1
episodes.overview: Jailed ex-policeman Miguel Palacios is tasked with infiltrating a Buenos Aires prison to help a judge find out who kidnapped his daughter.

episodes.name: Chapter 2
episodes.overview: Pastor Peña continues to develop his plan to get closer to the Borges brothers. Meanwhile, his own brother brings him unexpected news.

episodes.name: Chapter 3
episodes.overview: Pastor struggles to make contact with Luna. Emma is threatened when she tries to tell the truth about Diosito. Fernando confronts Lunati.

episodes.name: Chapter 4
episodes.overview: Diosito starts to get suspicious of Pastor and his intentions. An inmate's depression worsens. Lunati demands he get his daughter back.

episodes.name: Chapter 5
episodes.overview: Luna's transfer from the prison becomes an increasingly dangerous endeavor. Lunati follows through on his threat. Pastor comforts Emma after a loss.

episodes.name: Chapter 6
episodes.overview: Pastor learns troubling news about his family. The attorney general begins an investigation into recent incidents in the prison.

episodes.name: Chapter 7
episodes.overview: A flashback reveals more about Pastor's past life as Miguel. In the present, Pastor is consumed by the need to find his missing son.

episodes.name: Chapter 8
episodes.overview: Antín makes good on his promise, but adds a few conditions. Emma's assistance in Pastor's search for his son leads her to a shocking discovery.

episodes.name: Chapter 9
episodes.overview: Vengeful behavior runs rampant in the San Onofre prison and the stakes couldn't get any higher. Antín worries he has lost control of his inmates.

episodes.name: Chapter 10
episodes.overview: Emma checks in on Pastor's mother. The feud between the Borges brothers and Sub 21 continues while Antín worries his lies will catch up to him.

episodes.name: Chapter 11
episodes.overview: Gastón raises the pressure on the warden. Emma finds a lead while looking for Pastor's son. Borges plots his revenge on Sub 21.

episodes.name: Chapter 12
episodes.overview: A prisoner remembers Pastor from his days as a police officer. Gastón is intrigued by rumors about Pastor and Emma's romantic relationship.

episodes.name: Chapter 13
episodes.overview: Pastor continues to plan his escape but Emma is concerned he is putting himself at risk. More people learn about Pastor's real identity.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: This prequel season looks at how Borges and Diosito replaced prison leader El Sapo, at a time when San Onofre was at its most corrupt and violent.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Borges and Diosito seal a deal: Malcom sells drugs and the Borges will set a distribution network into the prisons. Cristian, son of a prominent businessman, is incarcerated San Onofre.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: Drugs are flooding San Onofre. Fiorito, a young "Sub 21", steals drug from the lab. Luna visits Cristian, who is under a false identity.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Cristian gets crack through guard Ramos, who in turn asks to the Sub 21. César's plan to become Cristian addicted to undermine the power of the Borges is working.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: Diosito wants revenge on Marquitos for stabbing Cristian. Meanwhile, Borges celebrates that the business is going better than ever, and even lets Cristian take a line of coca.

episodes.name: Episode 5
episodes.overview: The climate remains tense between Borges and Diosito. At first they are treated with respect, until Diosito asks him to help him find out who killed Mecha and take revenge.

episodes.name: Episode 6
episodes.overview: The Borges make an agreement with Pardo, Cristian's father, but Bruni and César will try to avoid it. Diosito continues to search for the truth and interrogates Karina about Mecha's death.

episodes.name: Chapter 7
episodes.overview: Estela is presented as an intervener of San Onofre in front of the inmates. Borges and his band dismantle the laboratory, preparing for the exit of the prison but Lunati has other plans for them.

episodes.name: Chapter 8
episodes.overview: Bruni and Pantera along with the Sub 21 take Diosito and Borges to the tree patio where a coffin and a grave await them. The revolt in San Onofre will bring many changes to the prison.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: A year before Season 1, the Borges must protect a rich man's son while dealing with forces in and out of the prison that threaten their dominance.

episodes.name: Capítulo 1
episodes.overview: The Borges are moved to a new prison, where they must start from scratch, and where their nemesis, former cop Miguel Palacios, is also imprisoned.

episodes.name: Capítulo 2
episodes.overview: Diosito brawls with Miguel and the warden steps in. Brutally subjugated, a traumatized Diosito begins to question his life.

episodes.name: Capítulo 3
episodes.overview: Miguel and Diosito arrive at a dangerous detente. Cesár's gang attacks the Borges' business. And Mario's partner finds herself defenseless at home.

episodes.name: Capítulo 4
episodes.overview: Tensions grow between Coco and Mario after Miguel begins working for Coco. Coco takes revenge on Cesár, and Gladys has her way with her attackers.

episodes.name: Capítulo 5
episodes.overview: Colombia stumbles on Bardo's secret love affair. Miguel and Brian sneak into the laundry room and explore the remnants of the old bridge.

episodes.name: Capítulo 6
episodes.overview: Mario turns Colombia's info into a powerful weapon against Coco, unaware Antín is arming himself with data buried deep in Mario's prison file.

episodes.name: Capítulo 7
episodes.overview: Gladys insists Mario tell Diosito the truth. But Diosito doesn't take it well. Miguel tells Emma his plans, and about his unlikely discovery.

episodes.name: Capítulo 8
episodes.overview: Tensions between Antín and the warden, and between Mario and Coco, come to a head. As the prison explodes in a bloodbath, Miguel makes his move.

4.name: Season 4
4.overview: A new prison, a new warden, a new nemesis, a new kid, a new alliance and an ex-wife play critical roles when the Borges are moved to a new lockup.

episodes.name: Capítulo 1
episodes.overview: Back in jail, Miguel resorts to writing about his experiences as a healing mechanism. On the outside, Diosito turns to a life of petty crime to survive.

episodes.name: Capítulo 2
episodes.overview: Miguel receives an unexpected visitor, who wants to help him with Lucas' custody. Brian prepares for his release. Diosito asks Mopey for help once again.

episodes.name: Capítulo 3
episodes.overview: A murder fuels the quarrel between Mario, Miguel and the Sub-21. Colombia reveals a secret to Luna. Diosito learns a shocking truth about Kari.

episodes.name: Capítulo 4
episodes.overview: To Antin's dismay, Judge Piñeiro kicks off her investigation in Puente Viejo. Gladys visits Diosito, and tells him about Mario's precarious situation.

episodes.name: Capítulo 5
episodes.overview: A former inmate returns to Puente Viejo. Luna arranges a visit for Lucas and Miguel. Tensions between Bardo and Medina come to a boiling point.

episodes.name: Capítulo 6
episodes.overview: As the Reborn extend their siege, an operation attempts to subdue the riot. Meanwhile, Miguel and Diosito will stop at nothing to protect their own.
